definitions.definition: Reputation impacting one's ability to be believed .
examples: After weeks of blowing smoke , her credibility with me was next to nil.

definitions.definition: Believability of statements by a witness , as measured by whether the testimony is probable or improbable when judged by common experience.

main_definition: Reputation impacting one's ability to be believed .
secondary_definitions: ( law ) Believability of statements by a witness , as measured by whether the testimony is probable or improbable when judged by common experience.
